title: The Way She Loved
description: Every relationship has ups and downs. But, only those relationships that sustain separation and pain will stand the test of time.Ayush, a small town boy, falls in love with Arpita who is older than him and already has a boyfriend. After much struggle, he succeeds in getting into a relationship with her. They fall in love but end up going their separate ways. Ayush is deeply affected by the breakup and is plagued by unanswered questions.What were the reasons behind Arpita's change in behavior? Did she really love him? Would he learn to live with the pain?Does Ayush come to understand The Way She Loved?
author: Nitin Kumar
